img_summary: This image depicts the "Body-Warming Powder," an uncommon consumable item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. It is used to instantly remove the Chilled State and temporarily reduce Chill Resistance. Players can craft this item at the Shrine store under "Make Medicines" after assisting Xu Dog in defeating Lang-Li-Guhh-Baw at Sandgate Village - Village Entrance in Yellow Wind Ridge. The crafting recipe requires 1 Fire Bellflower.
